name: require-dir-all
description: Yet another Node.js helper to require all files in directory

scripts.commit: git commit -am "auto commit by 'npm run commit'" && npm test
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Alexander Lykoshin <alykoshin@gmail.com>
